content: join to begin working in the round the beginning of the round will be at the back of the foot start ribbing *p1 k1tbl p1* work ribbing for 16 rounds or until the cuff measures the desired length in the last round work sizes s and l at the end of the round as follows size s increase 1 st you have now 64 sts size l decrease 1 st you have now 80 sts knit 8 rnds attach mc and start color work following chart a1/a2 change to larger needles if necessary for the color work repeat chart a1/a2 in total 8/9/10 times in the round work row 1 24 once cut cc and change to smaller needles if you have used larger needles in color work knit 14 rnds or until the leg measures the desired length 2 heel i call this heel a pyramid heel because of its shape the gusset in this heel is worked at the beginning of the round using chart b you may wish to place stitch markers to indicate the beginning and the end of the gusset work other sts in stockinette depending on your size you may not complete all the row of chart b size s work row 1 25 24 gusset sts size m work row 1 27 26 gusset sts size l work row 1 29 28 gusset sts if the gusset seems to be too short work a few rounds as established without increases rearrange your sts as follows - on the sole 16/18/20 sts + gusset sts 24/26/28 + 16/18/20 sts making a total of 56/62/68 sts - on the instep 32/36/40 sts your working yarn is now on the right side of the gusset heel turn the heel turn is worked back and forth row 1 rs k15/17/19 ssk my way k1 turn row 2 ws sl1 p7/9/11 p2tog p1 turn row 3 rs sl1 knit to 1 st before the gap ssk my way k1 turn row 4 ws sl1 purl to 1 st before the gap p2tog p1 turn repeat row 3 and 4 until there are 2 unworked sole sts on each side of the heel turn work row 3 but don t turn return to working in the round and knit instep sts on the sole k1 k2tog knit remaining sole sts you have now 64/72/80 sts congratulations the heel is ready 3 foot you are now at the new beginning of the round continue foot in stockinette when foot measures about 9 5/10/10 5 cm 3 75/4/4 25 inches less than desired finished length prepare yourself for the colorwork knit instep sts knit 16/18/20 sole sts and attach cc start chart c1/c2 in the middle of the sole change to larger needles if necessary to maintain gauge repeat chart c1/c2 in total 8/9/10 times in the round work row 1 15 once cut mc and change to smaller needles if you have used larger needles in colorwork knit remaining sole
